entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0067.7644] The filing has reported a value of "2,690,000" for the element us-gaap:CustomerDepositsCurrent. This is a revenue recognition element that is not a component of FASB 606 and does not appear in disclosure group 606000. However the following elements have also been tagged in the filing that indicate that the FASB 606 revenue recognition standard has been adopted: ContractWithCustomerAssetNet, ContractWithCustomerLiability, ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueRecognized, DisaggregationOfRevenueTableTextBlock, RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax, RevenueFromContractWithCustomerTextBlock
Either the new revenue recognition elements must be used or the old revenue recognition elements should be used but they should not be combined in the same filing.
The properties of this us-gaap:CustomerDepositsCurrent fact are: Period :2023-05-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7644 Rule version: 26.0.9 - aehr_10k.htm 2

[DQC.US.0067.7644] The filing has reported a value of "

Amounts billed to customers for shipping and handling of products are included in revenue. Costs incurred related to shipping and handling of products are included in cost of revenue.

" for the element us-gaap:ShippingAndHandlingCostPolicyTextBlock. This is a revenue recognition element that is not a component of FASB 606 and does not appear in disclosure group 606000. However the following elements have also been tagged in the filing that indicate that the FASB 606 revenue recognition standard has been adopted: ContractWithCustomerAssetNet, ContractWithCustomerLiability, ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueRecognized, DisaggregationOfRevenueTableTextBlock, RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcludingAssessedTax, RevenueFromContractWithCustomerTextBlock Either the new revenue recognition elements must be used or the old revenue recognition elements should be used but they should not be combined in the same filing. The properties of this us-gaap:ShippingAndHandlingCostPolicyTextBlock fact are: Period :2023-06-01 to 2024-05-31 Dimensions : Unit : None Rule Element Id:7644 Rule version: 26.0.9 - aehr_10k.htm 2

property.name: value
property.value: Amounts billed to customers for shipping and handling of products are included in revenue. Costs incurred related to shipping and handling of products are included in cost of revenue.
